fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.heater

Class Heater

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.heater.Heater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI, HeaterInternalControlI, HeaterUserAndControlI, HeaterUserAndExternalControlI, HeaterUserImplI

    public class Heater
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
implements HeaterUserImplI, HeaterInternalControlI
    The class Heater a heater component.

    Description

    The component is relatively complex as it attempts to show in one component several possibilities, like the capability to create several local simulation architectures, the definition of a well-structured sensor and actuator interfaces as well as the capability to run in different modes (unit test, integration test, MIL simulations and SIL simulations) each with their own test scenario.

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       targetTemperature >= -50.0 && targetTemperature <= 50.0
 invariant       currentPowerLevel >= 0.0 && currentPowerLevel <= MAX_POWER_LEVEL

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-09-18

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

        protected Heater(java.lang.String reflectionInboundPortURI,
                 java.lang.String heaterUserInboundPortURI,
                 java.lang.String heaterInternalControlInboundPortURI,
                 java.lang.String heaterExternalControlInboundPortURI,
                 java.lang.String heaterSensorInboundPortURI,

                 ExecutionType currentExecutionType,
                 java.lang.String simArchitectureURI,
                 java.lang.String localSimulatorURI,
                 double accFactor,
                 java.lang.String clockURI)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        create a new heater.

        Contract

         pre     reflectionInboundPortURI != null && !reflectionInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     heaterUserInboundPortURI != null && !heaterUserInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     heaterInternalControlInboundPortURI != null && !heaterInternalControlInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     heaterExternalControlInboundPortURI != null && !heaterExternalControlInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     heaterSensorInboundPortURI != null && !heaterSensorInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     heaterActuatorInboundPortURI != null && !heaterActuatorInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     currentExecutionType != null
 pre     !currentExecutionType.isSimulated() || (simArchitectureURI != null && !simArchitectureURI.isEmpty())
 pre     !currentExecutionType.isSimulated() || (localSimulatorURI != null && !localSimulatorURI.isEmpty())
 pre     !currentExecutionType.isSIL() || accFactor > 0.0
 post    !on()
        Parameters:
        reflectionInboundPortURI - URI of the reflection inbound port of the component.
        heaterUserInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component for user interactions.
        heaterInternalControlInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component for internal control.
        heaterExternalControlInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component for external control.
        heaterSensorInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component sensors.
        heaterActuatorInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component actuators.
        currentExecutionType - current execution type for the next run.
        simArchitectureURI - URI of the simulation architecture to be created or the empty string if the component does not execute as a simulation.
        localSimulatorURI - URI of the local simulator to be used in the simulation architecture.
        accFactor - acceleration factor for the simulation.
        clockURI - URI of the clock to be used to synchronise the test scenarios and the simulation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
